content: this easy and satisfying crochet top is a perfect pattern for newer crocheters and experienced stitchers alike created in red heart roll with it mélange you ll stitch up 2 identical panels featuring an all-over simple v_stitch pattern with endless color variations in one ball this simple garment looks more advanced than it is it s a gorgeous addition to your summer wardrobe materials red heart® roll with it mélange™ 5 29 oz/150 g 389 yds/356 m sizes xs/s m l xl 2/3xl 4/5xl theatre 0573 2 2 2 3 3 3 balls gauges 15 single_crochet and 19 row = 4 10 cm 5 v-sts and 7 row = 4 10 cm in pat finished chest xs/s 38 ¾ 98 5 cm m 43½ 110 5 cm l 48 122 cm xl 52½ 133 5 cm 2/3xl 57¼ 145 5 cm
